page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Garage}.The majority of houses have a garage. This can be joined on to the side of the house,in which case there may be access directly from the house,as well as from the main doors, or it may be set away from the house.The main function of the garage is to house motor vehicles, to protect them from extreme weather conditions, which can adversely affect their running,and also to protect them from intruders.However, it is also frequently used to store bicycles,lawn mowers, garden tools,( such as spades,forks,rakes,hoes and shears ), and tools for carpentry and home making.It can also be used as a workshed for carpenting, metal work, and repairing motor vehicles. Work benches may be installed for this purpose.
